sentences.en: "Kathleen" was, as its 1892 subtitle asserted, "An Irish Drama".
sentences.cn: 正如1892年剧本的副标题所强调的，《凯瑟琳》是一部“爱尔兰戏剧”。

sentences.en: "Lorna Doone" is subtitled "a Romance of Exmoor."
sentences.cn: 《洛娜·杜恩》的副标题是《埃克斯穆尔的一个浪漫故事》。

sentences.en: a French film with English subtitles
sentences.cn: 附有英语字幕的法国电影

sentences.en: Ah! I don't know why they don't subtitle these movies.
sentences.cn: 唉! 我不知道这些电影为什么不打字幕.

sentences.en: Allows you to select target subtitle and audio track.
sentences.cn: 允许您选择目标字幕和音轨.

sentences.en: Customized settings: you may select subtitle and audio track freely.
sentences.cn: 自定义设置: 您可以选择字幕和音轨自由.
也就是这个副标题: 拥抱变化.

sentences.en: It allows you to select target subtitle and audio track.
sentences.cn: 它可以让您选择目标字幕和音轨.

sentences.en: Please limit the subtitle of your dissertation to twenty words.
sentences.cn: 请把你这篇论文的副题控制在20字以内.

sentences.en: Sometimes a subtitle gives you more information read the main title.
sentences.cn: 有时副题给你较多的信息阅读主题.

sentences.en: Subtitle I'll take part in any exhibition you have.
sentences.cn: (字幕)你策划的任何展览我都愿参加.

sentences.en: Subtitle We must continue having exhibitions to draw attention to ourselves.
sentences.cn: (字幕)要不断办展览,让大家都注意我们.

sentences.en: Subtitle We must establish close relationships with critics and journalists.
sentences.cn: (字幕)要和批评家,记者搞好关系.

sentences.en: Subtitle you are still quarreling. That makes me uneasy.
sentences.cn: (字幕)你们还在争吵, 真让我放心不下.

sentences.en: Subtitle Z lives far from here , we don't have enough time.
sentences.cn: (字幕)z?他住得很远, 来不及了.

sentences.en: The remaining provisions of subtitle C relate to standards and enforcement.
sentences.cn: 小标题C的其余原则都与标准和执行有关.

sentences.en: Therefore, the subtitle translation of this film deserves investigation.
sentences.cn: 因此值得探讨影片中的字幕翻译.

words.tran_cn: [计][图情]副标题；说明或对白的字幕
在…上印字幕；给…加副标题

trans.tran_cn: 小标题，副标题，（电影的）字幕
trans.tran_en: the words printed over a film in a foreign language to translate what is being said by the actors

trans.tran_cn: 在…上印字幕；给…加副标题
trans.tran_en: If you say how a book or play is subtitled, you say what its subtitle is
